problem.p: A hot air balloon of mass M1 is stationary (with respect to the ground) in mid-air. A passenger of mass m2 climbs out and slides down a rope with constant velocity v with respect to the balloon.
As the man slides down the rope, the center of mass of the balloon-man system will:

choice.name: move upward at a constant velocity

choicegroup.choice: Move upward at a constant velocity

choice.name: move downward at a constant velocity

choicegroup.choice: Move downward at a constant velocity

problem.p: As the man slides down the rope, the velocity of the balloon will be:
If the man stops moving, the balloon will:

choice.name: move upward at a constant velocity

choicegroup.choice: Move upward at a constant velocity

choice.name: move downward at a constant velocity

choicegroup.choice: Move downward at a constant velocity
